name: AzaCoin
description: Azarus was founded in 2018 and has been leading the Overlay Games sector ever since with livestreams. Viewers can head over to any Azarus-enabled stream to start playing Azarus Games alongside their favorite creators and other audience members. AzaCoins drive Azarus’ Overlay Games rewards system with players earning AzaCoins every time they play. The AzaCoin acts as a loyalty point for Azarus’ community and will serve as a utility and governance token.
